channel.title: Proes on CoreUI
channel.description: Recent content in Proes on CoreUI

item.title: Commercial license for CoreUI PRO
item.description: Summary Here’s an overview of what each license allows for to make it easy to pick what you need: Single (formerly Team) Unlimited (formerly Team Bundle) Enterprise Number of end products Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited Use in end product for personal use or a client check-circle check-circle check-circle Use in a free end product check-circle check-circle check-circle Use in an end product that is “sold” (Can have multiple paying users, ex. SaaS application) check-circle check-circle check-circle Use in stock items/templates or “generators” x-circle § x-circle § x-circle § How do we count the number of people and how many licenses you have to buy?
